text: India Summer (born April 26, 1975) is an American pornographic actress and nude model. She is thought to be the most productive female performer in the US pornography industry, starring in more than 1000 adult scenes. Summer has appeared in small roles in the television series Reno 911!, Sons of Anarchy, and Dexter. She also had a role on the Showtime cable series Girls of Sunset Place as Marina Haze. She also appeared in National Lampoon's 2007 movie Homo Erectus. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:American pornographic actors Category:Models from Iowa Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Des Moines, Iowa Category:Bisexual people Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT pornographic actors Category:LGBT models Category:American LGBT sex industry people Category:AVN Award winners
title: India Summer
